kentauros.bootstrap package¶

Module contents¶

kentauros.bootstrap module after ENV variables, CLI switches and config files have been evaluated: bootstrap kentauros for actual use

kentauros.bootstrap.ktr_bootstrap()[source]¶

bootstrap everything for actual use of ktr

kentauros.bootstrap.ktr_create_dirs()[source]¶

create confdir, datadir, specdir specified by ENV, CLI, configuration files
